org.andengine.input.touch.detector

Class ContinuousHoldDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.andengine.input.touch.detector.BaseDetector
      • org.andengine.input.touch.detector.HoldDetector
        • org.andengine.input.touch.detector.ContinuousHoldDetector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUpdateHandler, IOnSceneTouchListener

    public class ContinuousHoldDetector
extends HoldDetector
implements IUpdateHandler
    Note: Needs to be registered as an IUpdateHandler to the Engine or Scene to work properly. (c) 2010 Nicolas Gramlich (c) 2011 Zynga Inc.
    Since:
    20:49:25 - 23.08.2010
    Author:
    Nicolas Gramlich, Greg Haynes
